StandardContent
[Stereotype]




Description: The purpose of this stereotype, is to enable a 'BluePrint' mechanism. A user can create an exemplar as he desires, then creates a new term stereotype of a certain type, and add to that stereotype a dependency with the the 'StandardContent' stereotype to the exemplar he created. Upon creation of the new term element, rhapsody will merge the new element with the exemplar.
OfMetaClass: Dependency
